CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 2, 1946, pg. 17, reads: "'Carmen' takes the Air - 'Backstage at the Nixon.' Polly Rowles' Station WCAE air show was unusually good Monday night when principals of the 'Carmen Jones' cast crossed verbs with musical experts. Left to right: Lawrence Peeler, music critic of The Courier; David Mordecai, musical director, 'Carmen'; Napoleon Reed, Elton J. Warren, Muriel Smith, Polly Rowles, Glenn Bryant and Richard Carp of the Civic Opera Company, discuss the show's merits..."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Lawrence Peeler, David Mordecai, Napoleon Reed, Elton J. Warren, Muriel Smith, WCAE radio host Polly Rowles, Glenn Bryant and Richard Carp, standing backstage of "Carmen Jones" at Nixon Theater
